title: Satin Creditcare Network raises Rs 120 cr in a securitization deal with HSBC India
description: The transaction was concluded with a coupon rate of 9.30%, the company said Wednesday. The deal involved issuance of pass-through certificates (PTC) for an exact amount of Rs 119.12 crore.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
